name: Cooking Games Pizza Fast Food Maker & Kitchen Chef
name_original: Cooking Games Pizza Fast Food Maker & Kitchen Chef
description:
Cooking Games Fever Kitchen Food Maker become a chef master & cook tasty dishes and become a the best kitchen fever apprentice!The game will teach you how to cook delicious dish and take care of your restaurant!This is a new free cooking games for kids which adore french cuisine or american cuisine or chinese cuisine!Cook delicious diner!Become a real Super chef like Oliver or Ramsay and do the dash dinner now!Unleash your fever of cooking and start preparing meals,dish,dash and desserts!Use carefully the pizza maker & all the kitchen appliances from pizza ovens to cake maker to popcorn maker and coffee makers and to rice cookers to make the best food!Try all the cuisines from Fast Food to an Oriental Restaurant and Chinese Restaurants,you will be able to cook and learn a variety of cooking skills and cooking techniques!Become a waiter or a waitress and server all the customers with your legendary recipes!Start with hot dogs & burgers and work your way up to becoming the best chef in town!


How To Play:
- Join us and Make your favorite Ice Cream in your mobile device!
- Help Oliver and his friends to cook the perfect dinner dash and dish!
- Women adore to stay in the kitchen and prepare the perfect dinner dash for the loved ones!
- Chef Gordon is the boss and you have to do what he says, otherwise your meals and cookies will be burnt!
- Become the world number one chef and build your own trademark in food!
- Steal some really good recipes for preparing hot dogs or tacos and french fries with ketchup toppings!
- Of course,don't forget about pizza games and you'll love the pizza maker games too!
- Multiple challenges, puzzles of different levels and hamburgers to serve the customers with!
- Addicting restaurant time management game and hamburger management!
- Serve fresh hot dog with mustard and Ketchup to make more money!
- The fever cooking is strong, so try to collaborate with your apprentices like a real cooking chef!
- Play multiple challenging levels and serve the dinner in the dish or on the plates of your customers!
- You can bake tasty foods like ramen or sushi or hot dog and pizza!
- After playing the game, you will be the best chef in town!
- Ever wanted to play donut games or burger games or serve street food?Now you have the opportunity to bake your own kind of foods & play some Pizza Maker games like this one!
- Take control of the kitchen and demonstrate the skills of a master chef!
- Prepare dinner for your clients!


Features:
- A million combination of dishes to cook by selecting over 200 ingredients!
- 4 worldwide unique restaurants!
- Over 160 levels to complete and many burgers to create!
- Simulates real time manager games!
- Upgrade your kitchen appliances and interior!
- Decorate your restaurants to bring more clients to buy fresh food!
- Create your own kind of cookies or cupcakes!
- Beat your fever of cooking today!
- Start the dash cooking and create tasty recipes!
- Play with tasty ice cream graphics and functionality!
- Help Ramsay in his cooking dash adventure and help him discover his chef abilities & be the best chef in town!
- Start your restaurant business today and you will become a chef world!
- You will enjoy this Fast Food Maker game very much and learn how they serve on the streets of New York or Sydney and master the art of street food maker!
- World chef will teach you how to prepare hot dog or tacos and fries with ketchup topping!
- Open your famous cake shop and serve your customers with some tasty pastry!
- Multiple clients will want to eat hot dogs or burgers, so try to make them fast and dash dinner in record time!
- You will learn the basic ingredients for foods like ramen or sushi or hot dog and pizza!
- Prepare your coffee maker and clean your coffee machine to make the perfect one!

Download Cooking Games Fever Kitchen Food Maker and become the Super Chef master in all the cuisines around the world!
